places_with_reviews.name: AMRIT HOTEL
address: SURVEY NO 788, NR OVER BRIDGE AHMEDABAD - MEHSANA HIGHWAY, GJ SH 41, Chhatral, Ola, Gujarat 382729, India

reviews.text: Good place to stop for food. Good and fast service and what's most important is that the food is really tasty! We ordered Dosa and Chinese Manchurian noodles and we loved it!

Had a great experience of having meal here. They have provided quickest service. Very nice hotel.
Must visit with family for having delicious meal. Nice staff.

This hotel is so amazing. The waiteress were welcoming and kind. The room was super clean and comfy. The hotel is so luxurious and affordable. The food taste so delicious. The chicken so tender and tasty. I highly reccomend visiting❤️❤️

Nice food. Specially Makke di roti Sarso da sag. Food quality is great. But need improvement in plates and seats. Service also good.
Nice picture point with scuter and bullock cart.

We had a nice experience of  having dinner at Amrit hotel and I will recommend to hotel management that they must  have to concentrate on their staff for fast services without making the customer dissatisfied with waiting.

Over-all food quality was good.👍

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Planet
address: Babasaheb Ambedkar 3 Rasta, Opp. S.T. Workshop, N.H. No. 8, Dist. Gandhinagar, G.I.D.C. Estate, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text: The sleek design and modern amenities cater to both business and leisure travelers. With top-notch dining options and attentive service, it's a standout choice for urban explorers.

Hotel Planet is one of the most popular, comfortable and convenient hotel of Kalol, Gandhinagar, North Gujarat. All the staff and attendants of hotel is courteous, responsive and very cooperative. This Hotel is quite peaceful and well maintained. All facilities and services required for a comfortable stay is available here. Room Service is available for breakfast, lunch and dinner, however dining facility is also available in the restaurant at ground floor.

I absolutely love this hotel! Every time I stay here, I am consistently impressed by the exceptional service and wonderful amenities. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel welcomed and valued throughout my stay. The rooms are comfortable and beautifully designed, providing a perfect blend of relaxation and luxury. The attention to detail in every aspect, from the exquisite decor to the delectable dining options, is truly remarkable
Excellent place for vacation with family . Good connectivity . Nice atmosphere . Price awesome

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ananya
address: Third & Fourth Floor, Kamla Amrut Complex, opp. Railway station, Navjivan Mill Compound, Memon Market, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text:
Extremely unprofessional and rude staff behaviour. Owner is good.
Unreliable if you plan your stay . They can refuse to honour
your advance booking
Room service in Hotel Ananya is very good but food doesn't taste good.

This hotel is the best hotel in Kalol, considering the price they charge for 1 days of stay.
- Connectivity is best (in front of Kalol Railway Station)
- Staff is well behaved and cooperative.
- Food is Good
- Rooms are clean

I will definitely suggest Hotel Ananya for the stay in Kalol.
A decent place to stay. We took a night halt here ,as we had a follow on journey the next day... Food was absolutely fantastic....no issues with parking.. completely safe..... courteous staff...
Good clean hotel and good staff with very friendly owner. Will keep on booking this place whenever need arises.
